title: Werewolf Game Guide
subtitle: Complete guide to playing Werewolf on Discord server

commands.usage: Use when you want to start a new game session
Use after someone has created a room with Wnew
Use when you want to exit the game before it starts
Use when enough players have joined

commandSequence.title: Command Execution Sequence
commandSequence.importantNote: After finishing a game, you must use Wnew again to create a new game session. The previous room becomes inactive once the game ends.

steps: Game master or any player uses **Wnew** to create a new room
Other players use **Wjoin** to join the game
When enough players have joined, use **Wstart** to begin the game
üî¥ **Night Phase**: Special roles (Werewolves, Seer, Bodyguard...) perform their actions
üü¢ **Day Phase**: All players discuss and vote to eliminate someone
Game automatically progresses when all actions are completed
Villagers win when all Werewolves are eliminated
Werewolves win when their numbers equal or exceed the Villagers
Use **Wnew** to create a new game after completion

night.title: NIGHT PHASE
items: ‚è∞ Actions happen ONE AT A TIME

roleExamples.description: Kill one villager each night. Work with other werewolves to eliminate villagers.
Can check one player's role each night to determine if they are werewolf or not.
No special abilities. Use discussion and voting to find werewolves.
Can protect one player each night from werewolf attacks.

tips: Perform actions SLOWLY and ONE PLAYER AT A TIME
Wait for bot confirmation before the next player takes action
Avoid spamming commands to prevent game errors
Follow bot instructions carefully in each phase
If errors occur, use Wnew to create a new game
Be patient during role assignments and phase transitions
Pay attention to private messages from the bot for your role instructions

criticalWarning.title: CRITICAL: Avoid Game Errors
items: üö´ DO NOT spam commands - wait for bot responses
üö´ DO NOT perform actions simultaneously - go one by one
üö´ DO NOT ignore bot instructions - follow the sequence
‚úÖ DO wait for your turn during night phases
‚úÖ DO use Wnew to reset if game gets stuck
‚úÖ DO be patient during role assignments
